      • saveMenuOnFile

                                  Menu menu)
        Save a Menu as a text file
        Parameters:
        file - The file in which the menu is saved
        menu - The menu to save

      • loadMenuFromFile

        public static Menu loadMenuFromFile(java.io.File file)
        Load a menu from a file. If the file does not exist, it will be created and an empty Menu is returned
        Parameters:
        file - The file in which the menu is saved
        Returns:
        The menu saved in the file, or a new empty Menu if the file does not exists
